item.description:
Hey tennis fans, Rafa and Fed has never met at the US Open Final and who knows when they will again given Fed's age and Rafa's creaky knees, let's meet tomorrow at the Omni Parker House bar (they got two, both have leather sofas and big tvs and they told me they will be carrying the final live).

I was fortunate to watch the Wim final between Rafa and Fed couple of years ago at the American Club in Singapore with a large group of ppl who liked tennis and we stay up until 4am till the match was finished, hope this one matches half of the intensity and in half the time I hope!

(Disclaimer, this would only happen if they both win, Rafa looks on his way already.)

Here is the Parker House link: http://www.omnihotels...
item.how_to_find_us: Find Chris at one of the Omni Parker House bar/lounges
item.name: Meet at historic Boston location to watch Djoko-Rafa US Open Final
